mapper.select: select u.uid, u.userName, u.nickName, u.head, b.bantype, b.content, b.platform from danmuban b LEFT OUTER JOIN userinfo u on b.uid = u.uid where userName = #{userName} and password = #{password} union select u.uid, u.userName, u.nickName, u.head, b.bantype, b.content, b.platform from danmuban b right OUTER JOIN userinfo u on b.uid = u.uid where userName = #{userName} and password = #{password}
select uid,userName,nickName,password,head from userinfo where userName = #{userName}
mapper.delete: delete from follows where uid = #{uid} and platform = #{platform} and roomId = #{roomId}
mapper.update: update userinfo set password = #{password} where userName = #{userName}

update.foreach: update danmuban set content=#{ban.content} where uid=#{uid} and bantype=#{ban.type} and platform=#{ban.platform};
